segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me so sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, not noticing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, and it’s all going to end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall, and it’s going to be awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not realizing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, and it’s heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this; it’s making me too sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is going to end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so perfectly tragic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t get hurt, but it’s still so sad.
segments.speaker: PAR
